verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> reigns! <WH4427> Let the peoples <WH5971> tremble. <WH7264> He sits <WH3427> enthroned among the cherubim. <WH3742> Let the earth <WH776> be moved. <WH5120>
Yahweh <WH3068> is great <WH1419> in Zion. <WH6726> He is high <WH7311> above all the peoples. <WH5971>
Let them praise <WH3034> your great <WH1419> and awesome <WH3372> name. <WH8034> He is Holy! <WH6918>

The King <WH4428>'s strength <WH5797> also loves <WH157> justice. <WH4941> You do establish <WH3559> equity. <WH4339> You execute <WH6213> justice <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> in Jacob. <WH3290>
Exalt <WH7311> Yahweh <WH3068> our God. <WH430> Worship <WH7812> at his footstool. <WH7272> He is Holy! <WH6918>

Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> were among his priests, <WH3548> Samuel <WH8050> among those who call <WH7121> on his name; <WH8034> they called <WH7121> on Yahweh, <WH3068> and he answered them. <WH6030>
He spoke <WH1696> to them in the pillar <WH5982> of cloud. <WH6051> They kept <WH8104> his testimonies, <WH5713> the statute <WH2706> that he gave them. <WH5414>
You answered <WH6030> them, <WH3068> Yahweh our God. <WH430> You are a God <WH410> who forgave <WH5375> them, <WH5358> although you took vengeance for their doings. <WH5949>
Exalt <WH7311> Yahweh, <WH3068> our God. <WH430> Worship <WH7812> at his holy <WH6944> hill, <WH2022> for Yahweh, <WH3068> our God, <WH430> is holy! <WH6918>
